message.original: ねぇマスター、宝石が採れるかもしれないわ ピッケルは十分持ってきています？
message.translation: Hey, a master, a jewel may be produced Does the ice ax last enough?

message.original: 宝石のような青い光が 洞窟内一面に煌めいているなんて―― ねぇマスター、ロマンチックだと思わない？
message.translation: Inexperienced light such as the jewel To glitter in the all over in the cave; - - Hey, don't you think that a master is romantic?

message.original: 地図を見ていたのだけど、複雑な洞窟ね 地下へ下りられる場所も いくつかあるみたいよ
message.translation: Though it watched a map, it is a complicated cave In the place gone down to the basement There seems to be it how old it is

message.original: うふふ、手が届きそうな場所に 燐光虫がいたら、少しだけ貰っていきましょう
message.translation: In the place where Giggle, a handle seem to reach If there is a phosphorescence insect, I will get only a little

message.original: マスター、注意してね 敵がどこから来るか分からないし
message.translation: Be Careful, Master, I don't understand where an enemy comes from

message.original: 危険な魔物が現れたら逃げるのも手です 退路を間違えば、追い詰められてしまうけど
message.translation: It is a hand to escape if an in danger demon appears It is cornered if I make a mistake in the way of retreat
